/usr/bin/c++    -Wall -std=c++11    CMakeFiles/Assignment.dir/CClothSimulationTask.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Assignment.dir/CParticleSystemTask.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Assignment.dir/CAssignment4.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Assignment.dir/CTriMesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Assignment.dir/CGLTexture.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Assignment.dir/GLCommon.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Assignment.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Assignment.dir/HLSL.cpp.o  -o Assignment -rdynamic -lOpenCL glfw/src/libglfw3.a -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lrt -lm -lXcursor -lGL glew/libglew64.so -lGLU Common/libGPUCommon.a -Wl,-rpath,/home/kkari/UniStuff/GPUC/Assignment4/Assignment4.build/glew
